import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './styles.css'; function SignUp() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', phoneNumber: '', email: '', password: '', profileImage: null }); const handleSignInClick = () => { navigate('/login'); }; const handleImageUpload = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; if (file) { setFormData({ ...formData, profileImage: URL.createObjectURL(file) }); } }; return (

SIGN UP

CREATE A ACCOUNT

{formData.profileImage ? ( ) : (
+
)}

Already have an account? sign up

); } export default SignUp;
